about.name: Cardano Single Pool Alliance
about.description_short: Cardano Single Pool Alliance is a loosely connected group of separate stake pool operators who have all vowed to run a single stake pool for the sole purpose of providing the Cardano ecosystem with True Decentralization.
about.description_long: The CSPA’s primary goal to  promote True Decentralization for the Cardano blockchain. CSPA has no central authority or leadership. As a group, we aspire to an ideal – that only an abundance of single-owner-single-pool can shield Cardano against any attack.  We are bonded together by a single focus – that each stake pool operator should operate a single stake pool in the Cardano ecosystem.
